### Want to give talk at a MaineR Event?

This year, we are hoping to plan six events (one event every other month) with a mix of in-person social events and hybrid technical talks.

Here is the current **2023** event calender:

-   **January**
    -   [Data on Tap: MaineR Social Hour (Portland, ME)](https://www.meetup.com/maine-r-users-group/events/291004052/)
-   **March**
    -   [Data Mining Methods - (Roux Institute, Portland, ME)](https://www.meetup.com/maine-r-users-group/events/291690026?utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=share-btn_savedevents_share_modal&utm_source=link)
-   **May**
    -   [Introduction to {targets} - (Think Tank CoWorking, Portland, ME)](https://www.meetup.com/maine-r-users-group/events/292955804/)
-   **July**
    -   [Data on Tap: MaineR Social Hour - (Portland, ME)](https://www.meetup.com/maine-r-users-group/events/294647339/)
-   **September**
    -   [Posit::conf23 - (Chicago, Illinois)](https://posit.co/conference/)
-   **October**
    -   [Lightning Talks with Jackson Laboratories - (Bar Harbor, ME)](https://www.meetup.com/maine-r-users-group/events/296206716/)
-   **December**
    -   Merry Hexmas Party - MaineR Social Hour (Location, TBD)

To RSVP to one of our events, check out our [MeetUp](https://www.meetup.com/maine-r-users-group/members/?op=leaders) page.
